description.value:
The Breath of the End reigns over the slow creeping cold of winter and its toll. One of the Agonies, he lives only to see the world succumb to dust.

Edicts: Preach of the upcoming end times, destroy that which has outlived its usefulness, put the suffering out of their misery.

Anathema: Construct shelter against the elements, spread hope, save someone dying from exposure.
